status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Description 
Verify that turning off Fastdev in tiapp.xml turns off Fastdev

h3. Steps to reproduce issue 
1. Put flag to turn off Fastdev in the top level of the tiapp.xml: 
<property name="ti.android.fastdev" type="bool">false</property> 
2. Launch project in emulator 
3. From a new terminal, navigate to the project 
4. Then type "titanium fastdev status"

h3. Expected result 
Should display: "No Fastdev servers running in <project>"

h3. Actual result 
Failed: fastdev is still able to run

Test run: http://appcelerator.testlodge.com/projects/1317/test_runs/8375#executed_case_161993
